# NSCandidateListTouchBarItemDelegate

**Protocol**

A set of methods that a candidate list item delegate uses to enable selection state and list visibility.

## Declaration

```swift
protocol NSCandidateListTouchBarItemDelegate : NSObjectProtocol
```

## Handling selection changes

- **candidateListTouchBarItem(_:beginSelectingCandidateAt:)**: Tells the delegate that the user has started touching one of the candidates in the candidate list item.
- **candidateListTouchBarItem(_:changeSelectionFromCandidateAt:to:)**: Tells the delegate that user has moved from touching one candidate in the candidate list item to another.
- **candidateListTouchBarItem(_:endSelectingCandidateAt:)**: Tells the delegate that a user has stopped touching candidates in the candidate list item.

## Handling visibility changes

- **candidateListTouchBarItem(_:changedCandidateListVisibility:)**: Tells the delegate that the visibility of the candidate list has changed.

## Providing a client and a delegate

- **client**: The client object for the candidate list item.
- **delegate**: The delegate of the candidate list item.

## Inherits From

- NSObjectProtocol

## Conforming Types

- NSTextView
